name: part_006
file: tmp_《BIRDS NIGHT OUT》 Pavolia Reine 3D Birthday Live 2024 #ReineMeptember2024 [DNDhaDTXta4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine talks about the concert's rave-inspired theme and the upcoming performances.
Transition and costume change into an idol outfit for the next song.
Performance of 'DADDY ! DADDY ! DO !' with Kobo Kanaeru appearing in a chibi form.
